DataElement.preferredName: Person Pharmacologic Substance Current Clinical Trial Consent Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/site not participating indicator whether consent or permission from a person was obtained to participate in a drug study, assessment of an active natural, synthetic or semi-synthetic ingredient including endogenous body substance that is intended to furnish pharmacological activity or other direct effect in the diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease or to affect the structure or any function of the human body, as part of the current clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Pharmacologic Substance Current Clinical Trial Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the consent or permission from a person to participate in a drug study, assessment of an active natural, synthetic or semi-synthetic ingredient including endogenous body substance that is intended to furnish pharmacological activity or other direct effect in the diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease or to affect the structure or any function of the human body, as part of the current clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

Property.preferredName: Pharmacologic Substance Current Clinical Trial Consent
Property.preferredDefinition: A natural, synthetic or semi-synthetic substance including endogenous body substance used to diagnose, prevent, maintain, treat or analyze abnormal and normal biological functions in vivo or in vitro.:Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.
Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/site not participating indicator related to the consent of a person to allow the collection of something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

PermissibleValues.value: Not applicable, patient less than 18 years old

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Patient Less Than Eighteen Year Old Not Applicable
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A natural number greater than seventeen and less than nineteen and the quantity that it denotes.: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.: Not new, of an earlier time.: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than seventeen and less than nineteen and the quantity that it denotes.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
Not new, of an earlier time.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to participate in the drug level studies that are being done as part of this clinical trial.
